channel.title: How in the hell
channel.description:
Okay heres my problem...
On the WL based server, with removed thread-per client, i cant't seem to get loading to work so i remved it, still loads from the .dat files. How could i possibly get it to load from .txt files in the character folder. Rawr this is annoying me..
